Class LibraryTest

java.lang.Object
LibraryTest
class LibraryTest
extends java.lang.Object
Test class for the Library class.
Author:
James Welsh

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryTest

      LibraryTest()

  • Method Details

    • testSetLibraryName

      @Test void testSetLibraryName()
      Tests both the setLibraryName() and getLibraryName() methods.

      Tests initial value, and that the name can be updated.

    • testContainsResource

      @Test void testContainsResource()
      Tests the containsResource() method and the addResource() method.

      Tests initial value, and that a resource can be added and that containsResource() returns the correct bool.

    • testContainsLibraryMember

      @Test void testContainsLibraryMember()
      Tests both containsLibraryMember() and addLibraryMember() methods.

      Tests initial value, then that a member can be added and containsLibraryMember() returns the correct bool.

    • testEditResourceTitle

      @Test void testEditResourceTitle()
      Tests both the editResourceTitle() and getTitle() methods

      Tests initial value, and that the title can be updated if it exists in the library.

    • testFindResource

      @Test void testFindResource()
      Tests the findResource() method.

      Tests parameter cannot be null, with an empty array, and with both books belonging to and not belonging to the library.

    • testRemoveResource

      @Test void testRemoveResource()
      Tests both the removeResource() and numberOfResources() methods.

      Tests that a resource can be removed, and that the expected return value is obtained from numberOfResources.

    • testRemoveResourceByIndex

      @Test void testRemoveResourceByIndex()
      Tests the removeResourcebyIndex() method.

      Tests that a resource can be removed if the index given is within range.

    • testAddResource

      @Test void testAddResource()
      Tests the addResource() method.

      Only tests that resource cannot be null as all other functionality has been tested in other methods in this class.

    • testAddLibraryMember

      @Test void testAddLibraryMember()
      Tests the addLibraryMember() method.

      Tests that a member cannot be null and that the member is added correctly id a LibraryMember object is supplied.

    • testAddElectronicDevice

      @Test void testAddElectronicDevice()
      Tests the addElectronicDevice() method.

      Tests that a device cannot be null, and that the device is added correctly if a ElectronicDevice is passed as an argument.

    • testLendBook

      @Test void testLendBook()
      Tests lendBook() method.

      Tests that a a book can be lent in only the case where the book is available and belongs to the same library as the member, and the member has less than 5 books out and belongs to the same library as the book. Both objects passed can also not be null.

    • testReturnBook

      @Test void testReturnBook()
      Tests the returnBook() method.

      Tests that a book can only be returned if the member and book belong to the library, and the user has the book on loan currently. It also tests both the case where damages are added and damages are not added.

    • testSendMessage

      @Test void testSendMessage()
      Tests the sendMessage() method.

      Tests that a message is not sent if the libraryMember has no books on loan and that a message is sent if the user does have a book out on loan.
